div.div: Relationship between empirical and predicted age-0 smallmouth bass abundance.
div.p: Plot of age-0 smallmouth bass for each sample predicted by the Ricker recruit-spawner model plotted against the actual number of age-0 fish collected. The solid line shows a 1:1 fit and the dashed line shows the least squares linear regression of the modeled and observed data (p = 0.004, R 2 = 0.48).
